expected_goal: Search Tesla stock news, determine if stock went up or down. If up, calculate $10,000 investment value and email result. If down, search analyst opinions and summarize.

atomic: Search for recent news about Tesla stock.
Determine if Tesla stock has gone up or down compared to last month.
Stock went up, calculate the current value of a $10,000 investment from last month.
Compose and send an email with the investment return results.
All tasks for the stock-up scenario are complete.
Stock went down, search for analyst opinions on Tesla.
Summarize the analyst opinions and commentary.
All tasks for the stock-down scenario are complete.
